definition: fortune-teller
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
early/prior/former/in advance/first
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: You become a mind reader and a fortune teller.
sentences.chinese: 你變成了一個揣摩別人心思的人，一個算命先生。

sentences.english: Excuse for missing the next day, the belt zishu emphasize people jewelry, grabbed a fortune-teller.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，子書帶人藉口丟失珠寶，抓了算命先生。

sentences.english: China’s fortune-tellers now have fresh competition.
sentences.chinese: 中國的算命先生現在有了新的競爭。

sentences.english: I wrote my birth time on a piece of paper and handed it to the fortune-teller.
sentences.chinese: 我把生辰八字寫在一張紙上，交給了算命先生。

sentences.english: The Wuchang let the fortune teller to write with notices.
sentences.chinese: 那五常讓算命先生代寫應戰告示。

sentences.english: I thought you did everything the fortuneteller told you to do.
sentences.chinese: 我還以爲你照着算命先生告訴的去做了呢。

sentences.english: Often there will be a fortuneteller who will seem pretty skilled at predicting cataclysms .
sentences.chinese: 時常會有一位善於語言災難的算命先生。

sentences.english: The fortune-teller predicted that I would marry a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 算命先生預言我會同一名醫生結婚。

sentences.english: Many fortune-tellers claim that they can tell your fortune(s) in the coming year.
sentences.chinese: 很多算命先生聲稱可預告你在新一年的運程。

sentences.english: Yuan Liuzhuang was an expert fortune-teller.
sentences.chinese: 袁柳莊是一個很準的算命先生。

sentences.english: Mr Ng is the temple fortune-teller.
sentences.chinese: 吳先生就是這廟宇裏的算命先生。

sentences.english: Often there will be a fortuneteller who will seem pretty skilled at predicting cataclysms.
sentences.chinese: 時常會有一位善於語言災難的算命先生。

sentences.english: What trees do fortune tellers like to look at?
sentences.chinese: 算命先生喜歡看什麼樹？

definition: fortune-telling/to tell fortune
fortune telling
fortune-teller who uses the subject's face for his prognostication
to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams
to divine using the trigrams/fortune telling
fortune telling based on the subject's face
to tell fortune by reading the subject's facial features
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan
one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
to tell sb's fortune
sorcerer
swindler/itinerant con-man
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
fortune-teller
acolyte in charge of incense in a temple
matchmaker
